#### PR description:
Replaced boost::filesystem for std::filesystem.
- std::filesystem and boost::filesystem are very similar in functionality. We should use std::filesystem where possible, since it is from c++17 standard.
#### PR validation:
Passed on basic runTheMatrix test.
